title: Off Delaware
lyrics:
Monday,
Back to the city.
Back to your city,
The one you call home.
Tuesday,
I've got to go away.

Will you come with me?

It's not very far.



But while you were sleeping

My heart started singing

To never let you go.



Wednesday,

I'd take it all away.

Except the time with me,

That's finally ours.



But while you were sleeping

My heart started singing.

While you were sleeping

My heart started screaming,

Never let you go.



Never let you go.

Never let you go.

Never let you go.

Ah ah

Never let you go.

Never let you go.



You want space

To be in another place.

Tell me you're with me,

Wherever you are.



And while you were sleeping

My heart started screaming

And while you were sleeping

My heart started singing

To never let you go.
